dialogues.speaker: Random Villager
dialogues.message: Leon! There is a hulking skeleton in the town square destroying everything. Please hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Please find a safe space to hide from the skeletons. I will head to the town square immediately!

dialogues.speaker: Elite
dialogues.message: Puny Human, you come here to challenge me. HA HA HA!! (Evil Laugh).

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Enough of your rampage. I am going to defeat you!
